titleStmt.title: A modest apology for the suspended bishops with a brief vindication of the address which was signed in their favour by the Grand-Jury of the county of Gloucester, at the last Lent assizes / by a gentleman of the said Grand-Jury.
titleStmt.author: Gentleman of the said Grand-Jury.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.B. and are to be sold by Randolph Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Half title: A modest apology for the suspended bishops, etc.
Pages 21 to 24 repeated and bound at end.
Imperfect: beginning-p. 1 from defective Union Theological Seminary Library, New York copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
